title: Sample
description: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products.

surgical_pathology_report_id.description: A unique identifier so someone can find the surgical pathology report.

clinical_report_id.description: A unique identifier so someone can find the clinical report.

parent_sample_id.description: Sample identifier assigned by the biorepository site. Example: EA123-45.

processed_sample_id.description: Aliquot identifier assigned by the biorepository site: EA123-45-1

cimac_id.description: Specimen identifier assigned by the CIMAC-CIDC Network. Formated as CM-????-????-??
cimac_id.$comment: With `in_doc_ref_pattern` here, there's no need to specify it each time cimac_id is $ref'ed, constrain will be pulled in place by ref resolver automatically, assuring that it will be checked for every cimac_id $ref.

site_description.description: Descritpion of the topography category. e.g LUNG AND BRONCHUS

ORBIT & LACRIMAL GLAND, (EXCL. RETINA, EYE, NOS)

collection_event_name.title: Collection Event Name
collection_event_name.description: Categorical description of timepoint at which the sample was taken.

sample_location.description: Sample location within the shipping container. Example: A1.

sample_collection_procedure.description: Indicates the specimen source of the sample shipped. Example: Na Heparin blood draw aliquots (2 of three), FFPE block #52

type_of_primary_container.description: The format in which the sample was sent.
enum: Stool collection container with DNA stabilizer

sample_volume_units.description: The unit of biological material from this sample.

processed_sample_type.description: The type of processing that was performed on the collected specimen by the Biobank for storage. e.g. Plasma

processed_sample_volume_units.description: Volume units of each liquid sample.

processed_sample_concentration.description: Volume units of each liquid sample.

processed_sample_concentration_units.description: Volume units of each liquid sample.

pbmc_frozen.description: Site or biobank provides the final number of PBMCs per vial that were frozen.

pbmc_recovered.description: Receiving site determines number fo PBMCs per vial recovered upon receipt.

material_used.description: Receiving site indicates how much material was used for assay purposes.

material_used_units.description: Units for the amount of material used; should be the same value as Specimen Analyte units.

material_remaining.description: Receiving site indicates how much material remains after assay use.

material_remaining_units.description: Units for the amount of material remaining.

quality_of_sample.description: Final status of sample after QC and pathology review.

sample_replacement.description: Indication if sample replacement is/was requested.

residual_sample_use.description: Indication if sample was sent to another location or returned back to biorepository.

genomic_source.description: The type of material submitted - tumor/normal/etc

quality_of_shipment.description: Final status of aliquot after QC and pathology review.
enum: Specimen shipment received in good condition
Specimen shipment received in poor condition
